recipe_name: Sautéed potatoes with parsley, garlic and lemon
author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the olive oil in a frying pan over a medium heat, add the potatoes and fry for five minutes, stirring frequently. Add the garlic and gently fry for one minute. Add the lemon zest and cook for a further 2-3 minutes. Season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper, add the herbs and the juice of half the lemon and stir well. To serve, place the potatoes into a serving dish. Cut the remaining lemon half into wedges and use to garnish the potatoes.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  300g/10½oz new potatoes, cooked, quartered,  2 garlic cloves, finely chopped,  1 lemon, zest only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  handful fresh parsley, chopped,  handful fresh basil, chopped,  1 lemon, halved
